   "source": [
    "# Intro to ROS\n",
    "\n",
    "The Robot Operating System (ROS) is a central component to our drone's autonomy. ROS offers a powerful set of tools for interfacing between multiple heterogeneous computer processes, which is a common theme of robotics due to that fact that robots are often composed of a system of processors, sensors, and actuators. \n",
    "\n",
    "The following set of video lectures and slides offer a concise introduction to ROS\n",
    "\n",
    "__Lecture:__ [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0BxVPCInS3M), [Slides](https://www.youtube.com/redirect?redir_token=9cFizt-Tf9Y2MOs3jnLu2XeWMSl8MTUzNjkzNTgyNUAxNTM2ODQ5NDI1&v=0BxVPCInS3M&q=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ethz.ch%2Fcontent%2Fdam%2Fethz%2Fspecial-interest%2Fmavt%2Frobotics-n-intelligent-systems%2Frsl-dam%2FROS2017%2Flecture1.pdf&event=video_description)\n",
    "\n",
    "__Practice:__ Once you've completed watching the lecture, practice what you've learned in the [Communication Pipeline](communication_pipeline.html) practical"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
